data.actual_result: Whole channel is marked as read, without actually having read them all.
data.expected_result: Unread messages aren't marked off because they've yet to be seen.
data.short_description: Unread message notifications disappear before scrolling to newest messages
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a channel with unread messages. - Scroll partially down the channel, without reaching the unread messages at the very bottom. - Switch to a different channel.
